snippet: Gov. Pat Quinn said Monday he would appeal the Federal Emergency Management Agency’s denial of assistance to homeowners affected by the southern Illinois tornado.
abstract: Gov Pat Quinn of Illinois says he will appeal the Federal Emergency Management Agency’s denial of assistance to homeowners affected by the southern Illinois tornado.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pat Quinn said Monday he would appeal the Federal Emergency Management Agency’s denial of assistance to homeowners affected by the southern Illinois tornado.

headline.seo: Illinois Governor Will Appeal Denial of Disaster Relief
headline.main: Illinois: Governor Will Appeal Denial of Disaster Relief
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Governor Will Appeal Denial of Disaster Relief
